description: Manage an IoT Central application private link resources.

commands.name: az iot central app private-link-resource list
commands.summary: List all of the IoT Central application private link resources in the specified account.
commands.syntax:
az iot central app private-link-resource list [--id]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--type]
examples: az iot central app private-link-resource list -g MyResourceGroup --n my-iotc-app
az iot central app private-link-resource list --id PrivateLinkResourceID

commands.name: az iot central app private-link-resource show
commands.summary: Show details of a private link resource in the specified IoT Central application.
commands.syntax:
az iot central app private-link-resource show [--group-id]
                                              [--id]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--resource-group]
examples: az iot central app private-link-resource show -g MyResourceGroup --n my-iotc-app --group-id iotApp
az iot central app private-link-resource show --id PrivateLinkResourceID
